company_overview.name: Cansel
company_overview.mission_statement: Cansel helps organizations in the engineering, surveying, construction, mining, architecture, manufacturing, printing, utilities, forestry, and government sectors measure, analyze, design, and build more efficiently and profitably. We have been providing tailored solutions to our clients for over 50 years.

products_and_services.main_products_or_services: Distributor of land-based positioning systems in Canada
products_and_services.core_value_proposition: Through the consolidated strength of our businesses, Cansel provides tailored solutions for individual project needs and addresses larger organizational solutions. We offer solution-based packages to maximize technology investment and simplify project delivery across industries.

offerings.field: Geospatial High Accuracy Field Instruments and Product

company_culture_and_values.working_environment: Depends on the job (remote-first, hybrid, etc.)
employee_qualities_valued: Ability to learn and understand quickly new technologies

tone_and_communication_style.preferred_tone: Formal but straight to the point

employee_benefits: Uncapped commission incentives for the sales team
Flexible extended health and dental benefits program
Group Life, Short-term Disability, Long-term Disability, AD&D, and Critical Illness Insurance
Access to Virtual Mental Health Services
Company vehicle program for Sales Reps
Book Club program (company purchases books for professional development)
Exclusive discount offers on shopping, sports, movies, travel, and more through Perkopolis
Preferred rates on some gym memberships
Access to Luxury Corporate vacation properties
